About Me

Let me introduce myself

BIO

Magna Cum Laude honors graduate, Bachelor of Science Degree in Computer Information Systems (April 2018).
Completed both required courses for U.S. Army IT Management qualification, Interim SECRET Security clearance (2007).
Member, The National Society of Leadership and Success, the nation's largest leadership honor society.
Awarded the Commandant's List Graduate: Warrior Leader Course for placing in the top 20th percentile of the class upon graduation receiving recognition.

DeVry University, 2018

Bachelor of Science in Compupter Information Systems, Magna Cum Laude

Educational concentration on web game programming.
Honors Graduate, Magna Cum Laude: DeVry University, April 2018, recognizing ongoing dedication to a high level of academic achievement.
Dean’s List: DeVry University, Summer 2015, Fall 2015, Spring 2016, Summer 2016, Spring 2017, Summer 2017, Fall 2017, Spring 2018 Recognizing academic excellence and hard work towards ongoing education. (GPA: 3.75).

2nd Ranger Battalion (Airborne), 2007

Team Leader; Afghanistan, Iraq

Duties include managing small team, monthly progress reports, physical fitness evaluations, technical proficiency training, tactical training (airborne), first aid training, vehicle training, supervision of special operations team members overseas, accountability of sensitive items routinely exceeding $1M dollars.

Bank of America Retirement Support Center, 2003

Retirement & Investment Support Specialist

Duties include assisting in full paperless form changeover project, coordinating with outsourced file management service to balance available storage space with relevant records, utilizing COIN and other credit verification applications to verify customer credit, input customer data into Bank’s proprietary database management system.
